subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: In a game dubbed as a “must-win” for the United States, the American players responded, delivering a victory over Costa Rica in a snowy World Cup qualifier on Friday.
snippet: In a game dubbed as a “must-win” for the United States, the American players responded, delivering a victory over Costa Rica in a snowy World Cup qualifier on Friday.
